name: Introduction to Islamic Ethical Teachings
description: An overview of Islamic ethical principles, drawing from the Quran and Hadith. The course begins with an introduction to the foundational sources of ethical wisdom in Islam.

lessons.name: The Role of Ethics in Islam
lessons.description: Introduction to the central role that ethics play in Islamic teachings, exploring key concepts and terminologies.

lessons.name: Understanding Moral Reasoning in Islam
lessons.description: Examination of how Islamic teachings approach moral reasoning and ethical decision-making.

name: Divine Guidance and Ethical Wisdom
description: A detailed look at the concept of divine guidance in Islamic ethics, with a focus on the figure of Khidr as a symbol of moral and spiritual wisdom.

lessons.description: An exploration of Khidr, his significance in the Quran and Hadith, and his role in guiding the righteous.

lessons.name: Divine Guidance in the Quran
lessons.description: Study of the Quranic verses that emphasize divine guidance and their ethical implications for believers.

name: Free Will and Accountability in Islamic Ethics
description: This module covers the balance between free will and divine destiny in Islamic ethics and how personal responsibility plays a key role in moral decisions.

lessons.name: The Concept of Free Will in Islam
lessons.description: An analysis of the Islamic perspective on free will and its impact on ethical behavior.

lessons.name: Accountability and Moral Responsibility
lessons.description: Exploration of how Islam emphasizes accountability and the moral responsibility of individuals.

name: Islamic Ethics and Contemporary Moral Dilemmas
description: Discussion of how Islamic ethical teachings can be applied to modern-day ethical dilemmas and personal spiritual growth.

lessons.name: Applying Islamic Ethics to Modern Issues
lessons.description: A critical discussion on how Islamic ethical principles apply to contemporary ethical challenges.

lessons.name: The Pursuit of Righteousness
lessons.description: Focus on the pursuit of righteousness (taqwa) in Islam and its practical applications in daily life.

name: Introduction to Islamic Esotericism
description: Exploring the foundational concepts of Islamic esotericism and its significance in Islamic spirituality.

lessons.name: Role of Mystical Experience

lessons.name: Rituals and Practices

lessons.name: Sufism and Social Change

lessons.name: Case Studies of Environmental Management

lessons.description: Drawing lessons from ancient practices for contemporary environmental challenges.

lessons.description: Exploring the concept of moral leadership through mythological narratives.

description: Applying lessons from Chinese mythology to modern leadership challenges.

lessons.description: Discussing how ancient leadership principles apply to contemporary issues.

lessons.name: Mythology and Corporate Leadership

lessons.name: Leadership Case Studies

lessons.name: Yu the Great's Flood Control Systems
lessons.description: Detailed study of Yu the Great’s efforts to control flooding in ancient China.

name: Ancient Irrigation and Waterways
description: Exploring the irrigation systems and water channels developed by ancient civilizations, with comparisons across different cultures.

lessons.name: Irrigation Systems in Mesopotamia
lessons.description: An in-depth look at the irrigation systems of ancient Mesopotamia and their impact on agriculture.

lessons.name: The Indus Valley Waterworks
lessons.description: Exploring the sophisticated water management systems of the Indus Valley Civilization.

lessons.name: Ancient Egyptian Canals and Basins
lessons.description: Understanding the development of canals and basin irrigation in ancient Egypt.

name: Construction and Materials in Hydraulic Engineering
description: Examining the materials and techniques used in the construction of ancient hydraulic structures.

lessons.name: Stone and Clay in Hydraulic Structures
lessons.description: Studying the use of stone, clay, and other natural materials in ancient waterworks.

lessons.name: Engineering Marvels of Ancient Dams
lessons.description: Exploring the design and construction of dams in ancient civilizations.

lessons.name: The Role of Labor and Technology
lessons.description: Understanding the labor forces and technology that enabled large-scale hydraulic engineering projects.

name: Comparative Hydraulic Engineering
description: Comparative analysis of hydraulic engineering practices in different ancient civilizations and their long-term impacts.

lessons.name: Mesopotamia vs Indus Valley
lessons.description: Comparing the water management systems of Mesopotamia and the Indus Valley.

lessons.name: Egyptian vs Chinese Hydraulic Engineering
lessons.description: Comparing the hydraulic engineering advancements in ancient Egypt and China.

lessons.name: Long-Term Impact of Ancient Waterworks
lessons.description: Evaluating the lasting impact of ancient water management systems on modern engineering.
